verses.verse: He makes me lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H1877>green<s%> <S%H4999>pastures.<s%> He <S%H5095>leads<s%> me beside <S%H4496>still<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
He <S%H7725>restores<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> He <S%H5148>guides<s%> me in the <S%H4570>paths<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> for his <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake.

Even though I <S%H3212>walk<s%> through the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> I will <S%H3372>fear<s%> no <S%H7451>evil,<s%> for you are with <S%H7626>me.<s%> Your rod and your <S%H4938>staff,<s%> they comfort <S%H5162>me.<s%>

You <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the presence of my <S%H6887>enemies.<s%> You <S%H1878>anoint<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%> My <S%H3563>cup<s%> runs <S%H7310>over.<s%>

Surely <S%H2896>goodness<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> me all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life,<s%> and I will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H753>forever.<s%>
